series_description: This series documents approvals and authorizations for Beneficial Use Determinations (BUD), educational compost exemptions, closure plan approvals for closure plans outside a permit, solid waste classification exemption variances, variances not associated with a permitted facility, and solid waste and medical waste alternate treatment technology authorization. This series may include but is not limited to: submittal records, associated correspondence, and final approval letters

series_title: Equipment Certification Personal Property Tax Exemption
series_description: This series documents efforts taken by individuals or corporations to certify recycling equipment for exemption from real or personal property taxes. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, letters of certification, and supporting documentation

This series documents efforts taken by individuals or corporations to certify their waste motor oil burning equipment for a state income tax credit. This series may include, but is limited: applications, letter of certifications, and supporting documentation § 58.1-439.10.

This series documents efforts taken by individuals or corporations, other than Chaparral Steel, to certify their recycling machinery and equipment qualify for a state income tax credit. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, letters of certification, and supporting documentation. 58.1-439.7

series_title: Equipment Certification: Recycling Tax Credit – Chaparral
series_description: This series documents efforts taken by Chaparral Steel to their recycling machinery and equipment qualify for a state income tax credit. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, letters of certification, and supporting documentation. 58.1-439.7

This series documents the uses of fossil fuel combustion byproducts (FFCB) as material in construction projects. This series may include, but is not limited to: request submittals, correspondence, and project approval letter

This series documents submission related to groundwater plume delineation and groundwater corrective action. This series may include but is not limited to: Nature and Extent (NES), Assessment of Corrective Measures (ACM), Proposal for Presumptive Remedy (PPR), offsite plume notification, exceedance notification, and interim Financial Assurance, Interim Measures (IM) proposal, Corrective Action Site Evaluation Report (CASE), Alternate Measures request Corrective Action Completion Report (CACR), and Technical Infeasibility Report (TIR)
retention_statement: 0 Years after termination of postclosure care

series_title: Groundwater Monitoring Program Development and Implementation
series_description: This series documents submission related to the of a groundwater monitoring well network, monitoring program, and groundwater monitoring reports. This series may include, but is not limited to: monitoring well installation reports and certifications, well subsets, multi-disposal unit network requests/approvals, Alternate Source Demonstrations (ASD), Wetlands Demonstrations, statistically significant increases (SSI) notifications, Table 3.1 Column A detects notifications, notifications of returning to detection or first determination monitoring, background detects notification during first determination, as well as requests to delete previous Table 3.1 column A or B detects, proposals to establish groundwater protection standards (GPS), use Alternate Concentration (ACLs), Semi-annual (SA) and Quarterly (QTL) Reports, First Determination Report (FDR), and Phase 2 Background Report and Annual Report (AR)
retention_statement: 0 Years after termination of postclosure care

series_title: Landfill Gas Monitoring Data and Correspondence
series_description: This series documents routine gas monitoring, landfill gas migration assessment, and remediation activities. This series may include, but is not limited to: initial notification of Lower Explosive Limit (LEL) exceedences, documentation of interim actions, assessments of gas migration, gas assessment and remediation correspondence, notification of return to compliance, and gas remediation termination requests.

Documents This series documents final approved Part A and Part B applications and modifications, permit denials and permit modification denials, Design Reports and Plans, Operations & Maintenance Manuals, Technical Specifications, Groundwater Monitoring Plans, Closure/Post-Closure Care Plans, Construction Quality Assurance (CQA) submittals, and Certificates to Operate (CTO). This series may include, but is not limited to: variances associated with a permitted facility (including groundwater), public participation documents, financial assurance, Emergency Permits, experimental temporary authorizations, alternate daily cover authorizations, permit-by-rules, Landfill Gas Management & Remediation Plans, Leachate Management Plans, as-built drawings and installation report, Odor Management Plan, Research, Development and Demonstration (RDD) Plans, Corrective Action Plans, Corrective Action Monitoring Plans, Surface Monitoring Plans, 10-year permit/compliance reviews, financial assurance cost-estimates, and tax certification documentation for pollution control equipment
retention_statement: 0 Years after termination of postclosure care

series_title: Pre-Virginia Solid Waste Management Regulations (VSWMR) Closed Facilities
series_description: This series documents permitted solid waste landfills that prior to December 21, 1988 and are not subject to current Virginia Solid Waste Management Regulations. This series include, but is not limited to: permits, drawings, inspection reports, photos, and environmental monitoring data.

Documents groundwater monitoring data, groundwater annual reports and related correspondence for solid waste management facilities. This information is used to determine the facility's compliance with Virginia Solid Waste Regulations and in the permit applications review process.
This series documents the solid waste activity plans for designated planning units as required by planning regulations (
legal_citation: 9VAC-20-130). This series may include, but is not limited to: submitted Solid Waste Management Plans (SWMP), correspondence, and final plan approval letters.

series_title: Solid Waste Management Plans Unit Designations
series_description: This series documents the designation of Solid Waste Management Plan (SWMP) Units by the Director as required planning regulations (
legal_citation: 9VAC-20-130). This series may include, but is not limited to: designation of planning units, associated correspondence, and final approval letters.

series_title: Termination of Post-Closure Care and Permit Revocation Records
series_description: This series documents partial and final termination of postclosure care and permit revocation. This series may include, is not limited to: termination of post-closure case correspondence, Professional Engineer’s Certification, Termination of Post-Closure Care Report, survey plat, deed restrictions, permit revocation correspondence, and permit revocation public participation waiver.
retention_statement: 50 Years after termination of postclosure care

series_title: Waste Facility Compliance Inspections and Correspondence
series_description: This series documents compliance inspections of solid waste facilities or unpermitted facilities. This series may include, but not limited to: inspection reports, forms and transmittal letters, photographs, supporting documentation and facility response, Notice of Violations (NOVs), warning letters (WL), referrals to enforcement, Solid Waste Information and Assessment and leachate monitoring data.
